block.p: Major League Baseball MLB--Reduced the suspension of Seattle 2B Mark McLemore from five games to four.
Major League Baseball MLB--Reduced the suspension of Seattle 2B Mark McLemore from five games to four.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Activated RHP Calvin Maduro from the disabled list. Optioned RHP Gabe Molina to Rochester of the International League. BOSTON RED SOX--Recalled LHP Tim Young from Pawtucket of the International League. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Agreed to terms with SS Tim Hummel and 2B Tommy Nicholson. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Agreed to terms with OF Kenneth Folsom, LHP Adam Cox, OF Rashad Eldridge and LHP Victor Kleine. Signed OF Robert Womack and C Mike Ernst to minor league contracts. DETROIT TIGERS--Purchased the contract of RHP Steve Sparks from Toledo of the International League. Designated LHP Allen McDill for assignment. MINNESOTA TWINS--Waived RHP Sean Bergman. Recalled RHP Jason Ryan and C Chad Moeller from Salt Lake City of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Signed RHP Casey Berry, OF Laynce Nix and LHP Chris Russ. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed 2B Dominic Rich, OF Rich Thompson and 3B Aaron Sisk. Transferred OF DeWayne Wise from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list.

National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Heath McMurray. NEW YORK METS--Signed SS Christopher Basak and C John Wilson. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Placed 2B Fernando Vina on the 15-day disabled list. Activated RHP Mike James from the disabled list. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Agreed to terms with RHP Jonathan Huber, RHP Micahel Earey, OF David Giorgis, 2B Kevin Nulton, 3B Joel Klatt, RHP Joseph Cassel, RHP John Herbert and RHP Jesse Bussard.
National Basketball Association CHICAGO BULLS--Cut C Will Perdue.

National Football League NFL--Suspended Tennessee DL Josh Evans for the 2000 season following a third violation of the league's substance-abuse policy. BUFFALO BILLS--Signed DT Leif Larsen. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Agreed to terms with DB Anthony Malbrough and DB Lamar Chapman on four-year contracts. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed LB Na'il Diggs to a multiyear contract. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed FB Kevin Houser to a three-year contract.
National Hockey League NHL BOARD OF GOVERNORS--Approved the sales of Colorado, New Jersey and the New York Islanders.
OLYMPICS USA HOCKEY--Named Moe Mantha associate U.S. national development coach.
United States Tennis Association USTA--Named Billie Jean King 2000 U.S. Olympic women's tennis team coach.
